alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Wrangell; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 22 at 6:47AM AKST until November 24 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Sitka, Port Alexander, Kake, Prince of Wales Island, Wrangell, Ketchikan, and Annette Island. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Wrangell; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
